page.title: 17CARNIVALS
page.content: {RUYTON XI TOWNS CARNIVAL}is held annually on August Bank Holiday Monday and is organised by a small committee headed by the Vicar.The event is held on the Burgage Field. It was previously held on the Bridge Inn Field by the River Perry where water sports were also organised but the venue had to be altered in 1984 after the {SEVERN TRENT WATER AUTHORITY} deepened the river by 6 feet(2m) making the venue far too dangerous. The programme of events starts at 13.30 with the pram race run from {THE {CROSS }to {THE BRIDGE INN,}with the winning pair receiving a Â£10 prize. For this event the police are very co-operative and close the road for the duration of the race. The procession of floats commences at 2.OOp.m. from the Bridge Inn and ends on the carnival field.
